introduction_description: Guaranteed liquidity for millions of users and hundreds of Ethereum applications.
liquidity_description: Giving individual LPs granular control over what price ranges their capital is allocated to. Individual positions are aggregated together into a single pool, forming one combined curve for users to trade against.
fee_description: Allowing LPs to be appropriately compensated for taking on varying degrees of risk.
decentralized_description: Trade directly from your wallet app. Unlike centralized exchanges like Binance or Coinbase, ManekiSwap doesn’t hold your funds when you trade, you have 100% ownership of your own wallet.
q3_2021: Create landing page and governance token.
q4_2021: Adding swap and liquidity functions that users can deposit into pools concentrated in price ranges they believe will see the most volume — and consequently — generate the most fees.
q1_2022: Public listing and auditing by well-known audit firms.
q2_2022: Preparing for next step with POS blockchain with validators.
q3_2022: Building custom blockchain for decentralized exchange with non-custodial wallet using Substrate.
subscribe_email: Make sure to receive our latest updates and announcements
will_be_in_touch: Thanks for your subscribing for our newsletter. We will be in touch and contact you soon!
